description:
Are you an avid listener of electronic music? Fascinated by it maybe? Now is your chance to learn it. This isn't a 'Learn how to become famous in 5 days' course, no, the aim of this course is to teach the basics of electronic music production as well as touching on some more advanced techniques - while keeping it fun!

  1. You will learn about effective drum programming techniques, how to write a solid bassline that fits well with your drums, basic music theory that can be practically applied to what you're doing, and much more.
  2. This course will take 2 weeks on average to complete, after that, be prepared for hours of extensive production work and researching - you'll be addicted!
  3. The course is structured by starting with fundamental music production processes and then moving on to more advanced and also essential techniques. There's no secrets here.

Taking this course will provide you with a great introduction to the world of music production, learning about the basics first will allow you to extend your creativity whilst staying between the guidelines of production. Music production should ultimately be fun and something you enjoy, the aim of this course is to capture that and hand it to you.
title: The Practical Way: Learn Electronic Music Production
